# HUD::SET_TEXT_DROPSHADOW

## Summary
Draw a drop shadow behind onscreen intro text

## Parameters
* **INT** dropAmount
* **INT** red
* **INT** green
* **INT** blue
* **INT** alpha

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
distance - shadow distance in pixels, both horizontal and vertical
r, g, b, a - color
